name: Heartbreak (Sean Davis)
description:
* FOR BRACKEYS GAME JAM #2*

THEME: LOVE IS BLIND

Love is blind!  By  using only the beat of your heart, traverse multiple challenging platforming levels to save your true love. The faster the better, but don't break your heart in the process!

*CONTROLS*

A/D or LEFT/RIGHT ARROW - PLAYER MOVEMENT

SPACE - JUMP

LEFT SHIFT - RUN

P - PAUSE

MOUSE AND LEFT MOUSE BUTTON - NAVIGATE GAME MENUS

*This game was created for the 2nd Brackeys Game Jame! I really enjoyed working on this project and hope you all enjoy playing it. As usual, any and all feedback is appreciated!*

- Is this game finished?

No.  While developing this for the game jam , I actually ended up liking the concept so much that I want to continue development. The games is missing some things, such as music and more levels, some of which is what I would like to continue working on. Stay tuned for possible updates!

- Where can I find more of your work?

If you'd like to stay up to date with what I'm doing and creating please give me a follow on Twitter!  You can find a link on my profile page or just search Sdisag!

 - If I donate, where does that money go? 

Any donations will go into to helping me fund future projects! 

- I have some ideas that I think can improve your  game, where can I make suggestions?

I'd love to hear from the players. If you have any suggestions/criticism, please comment below or find me on Twitter (@Sdisag) and message me! I love to talk games and game development
